app_description: Here you will find all the information about Judit & Cristian's wedding
app_introduction: In this application you will be able to indicate your diet, indicate if you have any allergies and other necessary information for the big celebration.
errors_not_implemented_app_text: Unfortunately, this application is not ready yet, but you will receive a notification to update and access to all its features.
errors_not_implemented_app_good_bye: We look forward to seeing you soon!
update_ready_text: You just need to update it, click on the button below and you will be able to access all the functionalities.
